imdb.title: Sword Gai: The Animation
imdb.plot: A boy bonds with a demon sword.

episodes.title: Episode #2.1
episodes.plot: Gai is revealed to be past the point of human life. Yet he still possesses the soul and will of a human. Will he be able to defeat his past comrade Ichijo who has become a living weapon...

episodes.title: Episode #2.2
episodes.plot: Although content with his missions for Shoshidai and relationship with his girlfriend, Marcus senses something is not right after his date with Aya.

episodes.title: Episode #2.3
episodes.plot: With a Busoma running rampant outside Shoshidai headquarters, Kagami reawakens three Chrusalises from cold sleep to neutralize the hostile threat.

episodes.title: Episode #2.4
episodes.plot: Himiko, leader of the Gabi, locates the Busoma responsible for her comrade Soin's death. Kagami is ordered to stand down against Marcus' Azoth.

episodes.title: Episode #2.5
episodes.plot: Gai has returned after studying with the Gabi. This dovetails intriguingly with the superior shiryu finding a new host...

episodes.title: Episode #2.6
episodes.plot: The true connection between both shiryu and both hosts is starting to unravel. Gai must embrace his destiny even if he doesn't want to...

episodes.title: Episode #2.7
episodes.plot: Zsoltgewinn must be stopped but at what cost? Kyoka tried to dry that very line into focus. The shoshidai prefer it blurry. Meanwhile Gai is at a crossroads of his own after meeting Shin...

episodes.title: Episode #2.8
episodes.plot: The sinister shoshidai project is reaping benefits. It is doing well enough to catch the attention of a busoma. Meanwhile Shin tries to convince Gai to help him with an important mission.

episodes.title: Episode #2.9
episodes.plot: Shin makes a grim discovery at the hospital where Rie resides. Meanwhile, both Yasuko and Arnys pay a visit to Issei who has left the Shoshidai.

episodes.title: Episode #2.10
episodes.plot: With his resentment towards Gai intensifying, Shin resolves to devote himself to combating the Busoma as a Chrysalis.

episodes.title: Episode #2.11
episodes.plot: Gai's awakening unleashes chaos into the world. Busoma Zsoltgewinn in Miura's human form appears before Amon and Kigetsu.

episodes.title: Episode #2.12
episodes.plot: With the all-powerful Grimms looking on, Gai and Shin face-off in a ferocious battle, wielding their respective Shiryus against one another.

episodes.title: Episode #1.1
episodes.plot: Shoshidai, an organization tasked with collecting cursed weaponry, dispatches two of its agents to retrieve the legendary Demon Sword Zsoltgewinn.

episodes.title: Episode #1.2
episodes.plot: An abandoned baby boy is adopted and named Gai by swordsmith Amon. He becomes an apprentice, later losing his arm in a ritual gone horribly wrong.

episodes.title: Episode #1.3
episodes.plot: After acquiring the Azoth Sword, Miki is ambushed by Marcus and Miura. Amon forges a prosthetic arm out of the sword Shiryu to replace Gai's lost limb.

episodes.title: Episode #1.4
episodes.plot: With his soul possessed by a demonic spear, Tatsumi transforms into a monstrous entity called a Busoma. Miki takes Marcus to Shoshidai headquarters.

episodes.title: Episode #1.5
episodes.plot: The Shoshidai reawaken their most powerful Chrysalis, Seiya Ichijo. After Gai's powers partially awaken, his mind reverts to that of an infant.

episodes.title: Episode #1.6
episodes.plot: The true history of the shiryu is revealed and Gai has a decision to make about his immediate future. Stay and be a humble sword maker or leave and grow into much more.

episodes.title: Episode #1.7
episodes.plot: The life of a chrysalis means long periods of the world passing you by. Gai learns this first hand from his new mentor...

episodes.title: Episode #1.8
episodes.plot: A wealthy widow hires a search vessel to find the lost treasure of pirate Throlla, who reportedly also kept a mythical weapon known as Gallon's Hammer.

episodes.title: Episode #1.9
episodes.plot: Miki and Marcus are sent on a covert mission by the Shoshidai to infiltrate and retrieve an ancient weapon of the fairy world: the legendary Halbert.

episodes.title: Episode #1.10
episodes.plot: A depressed Sayaka questions Amon about Gai's motives. Meanwhile, Ichijo reveals to Gai how he came to harness the power of the Chakram.

episodes.title: Episode #1.11
episodes.plot: After Gai is safely brought to Shoshidai headquarters, Ichijo is ordered by Kagami to cold sleep due to his rapidly progressing change into a Busoma.

episodes.title: Episode #1.12
episodes.plot: Gai is asked to keep a fatal promise to his new mentor. Will he be able to fulfill it when the time comes?
